english.segment1: stress in your life. it's you've been untrue. there's been nothing new. forever. a look in your eyes. you look twice your age. you've been almost through. forever
english.segment2: was this a training brood. they all passed us by. I wish they'd look at me. before I'm the one that cried. have you noticed that we're all getting old?. we're all getting old
